package.name: PHPCS_TYPO3_SniffPool
package.description: This package contains custom sniffs which are compatible with the PHP_CodeSniffer from the PEAR project. Understand this package as a sniff pool which contains all needed custom sniffs for the TYPO3v4, FLOW3/TYPO3v5 CGL. Additionally you must install the specific pear package for your preferred CGL.
